location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to The Honourable Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor In Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a set of bills of exchange which Colonel Stannus has granted on the Honourable Board in favour of Hajee Meer Hossen Cazroonee [Haji Mir á¸¤usayn Kazerooni] in order to meet the demands of the Residency.
